GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
ubifs: Fix deadlock in concurrent rename whiteout and inode writeback

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 83e42a78428fc354f5e2049935b84c8d8d29b787, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 9e0a1fff8db56eaaebb74b4a3ef65f86811c4798. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ubifs: Fix deadlock in concurrent rename whiteout and inode writeback
